title: Seeing an unjust ruler in the dream of unmarried and divorced women and men

preview.html: Seeing an unjust ruler in a dream is for single women, married women, divorced women, and men. Seeing an unjust ruler in a dream is one of the dreams that has many interpretations in the field of interpretation. This interpretation carries connotations that require optimism, and other interpretations that require pessimism, according to the person who sees this dream. Many people have discussed the The Arab world has its own interpretation of this dream from time to time, and we will shed light on the interpretation of seeing the oppressor. A ruler in a dream for married and divorced single women and for men, through this article. Interpretation of seeing an unjust ruler in a dream for married and divorced single women and men. Seeing an unjust ruler in a dream has many interpretations and explanations for the person who saw this dream in a dream, and we will look at these interpretations for you as follows: It is It indicates that there are some wishes that will come true for the person who saw this dream in a dream. There is an interpretation of this dream, which is that the person who saw it in the dream has to take care of some people around him. This dream indicates that some of the problems that the dreamer faces are on their way to being solved. Vision The unjust ruler in an unmarried woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the unjust ruler ruling her country, then this dream indicates many events that surrounded her life in the coming period, which we will review as follows: This vision shows that the girl who saw it is that the people who Her oppression is about to end. This vision shows the return of the stolen right to this girl. This dream is an indication that the dreamer will have a high position in society in the coming period. The interpretation of seeing the ruler in a dream and talking to Aharwa Ibn Sirin in his book The Interpretation is that he sees the unjust ruler and talks to him about The dream is that the person who saw this dream in a dream will receive a promotion in the organization in which he works and that this person will have a high status. Position in society Living in the period following his inauguration in a new place in his work, Ibn Sirin also saw that this dream indicates that some of the wishes that he wishes to the one who saw him in a dream will come true the next day. Period. The death of an unjust ruler in a dream. Seeing an unjust ruler die in a dream is a beautiful dream with interpretations that require optimism. For whoever sees this dream in his dream, whether he is a man, married, or divorced, this dream means that there is joyful news that he will receive in the coming period and that he will be among those with an opinion. In the society in which he lives in the coming period and that there are people who highly appreciate him in the social circle. As we explained in the previous article, seeing an unjust ruler in a dream for single, married and divorced women and for men carries a lot of positive humanities for the person who saw this dream in a dream, and there Some ominous things. Interpretations of this dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the call to prayer in a newborn’s ear

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a newborn’s ear in a dream by Ibn Sirin: To see someone in a dream reciting the call to prayer in the newborn’s ear, this indicates a new life free of problems and worries. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing ear ringing in a dream during prayer indicates achieving goals. As Seeing the call to prayer being recited indicates the soul of the dead martyr, and this indicates a quiet life and tranquility of the heart, and God knows best. Also, seeing a young man saying the call to prayer while prostrating, this indicates his close marriage to a beautiful, good-looking girl. Interpretation of seeing someone giving the call to prayer, if one dreams that he is repeating the call to prayer. To pray in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the opening of the doors of goodness and living for the dreamer. It also means hearing the sound of the ear with frequency in the dream. If one sees this vision in his dream, it means that sorrows will go away, and joys, circumstances, and marriage to a family member. Interpretation of the appearance of ear frequency In the ear of a newborn baby for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is hesitant to give permission for the newborn, this indicates the end of her worries and the achievement of her goals. This vision also indicates that she has joined a new job and indicates excellence in her academic and professional life and lasting success, and God knows best. If she sees An unmarried girl returns the ear to the newborn’s ear, as this indicates her soon marriage to a good person and a happy life. Interpretation of the appearance of the ear ringing in the newborn’s ear for the pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is ringing in the newborn’s ear, this indicates the facilitation of her birth and good news. Also, seeing The ear hesitating about a new baby in a dream indicates breaking the obstacles it was going through and stopping the pain of birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the ear hesitating in the ear of the newborn for a man. If one sees in his dream that he is hesitating about the ear in the ear of the newborn, this means that his brother will have good offspring. And God knows best. This vision also indicates faith, good deeds, repentance to God Almighty, and entering a new, prestigious job. Also, seeing a wavering ear in a man’s dream indicates the disappearance of sadness, pain, instability, traveling outside the country, and moving. A dream about ringing the ear of a deceased person in a dream indicates the disappearance of sadness, pain, instability, and traveling outside the country and moving. However, the dreamer will join a new job and indicates that his stature will rise, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in the ear of a newborn in a dream: Zooming in the ear of a newborn in a dream is one of the good visions that heralds goodness, happiness, and abundant living. Also, seeing the fortuneteller’s call to prayer in the ear of the newborn in a dream It indicates the end of anxiety, relief from troubles, and relief from distress. Interpretation of hearing an ear out of season in a dream If one sees himself in a dream reciting the takbir, this indicates the death of sadness from his life and the beginning of a new life with God. The interpretation of seeing an ear out of season in a dream is Evidence from God that all worries and problems will end in the dreamer’s life. Seeing ear recitation and repeated repetition in a dream is one of the desired visions and indicates goodness, safety from evil, and protection from God. If you have a dream you want an interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about having sex with a stranger, a dream about having intercourse with a stranger

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a strange man having sex with meInterpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange manInterpretation of a dream about intercourse with a known personInterpretation of a dream that a pregnant woman is having sex with someone other than her husbandInterpretation of a dream about sleeping with a man I knowI dreamed that I had sex with a strange manInterpretation of a dream about intercourse with someone other than my husbandI dreamed that I was in contact with a man who is not my husbandIf You saw yourself having sex or having sex with a stranger in a dream, you may feel a little mysterious, but you know that this dream is one of the most common dreams. You may be surprised by this dream and think that it is a sign or a glimpse of your partner in waiting, but it is not. In fact, This stranger that you have never met before has a very important meaning. This stranger actually represents a certain aspect of our personality and certain qualities that we lack and need to work on developing and strengthening. If you are a woman and you see that you are having sex with a strange man, this means that you need to Be more assertive in your life and express yourself and your thoughts. In addition, you should know how to manage your affairs and take responsibility for all your decisions. A stranger symbolizes things that you lack in your life according to his actions. For example, if a person is affectionate in a dream This symbolizes that you need tenderness and affection in reality. In other words, this stranger with all his qualities embodies what you lack. And if you are pleased with this person in the dream, this means that you admire his qualities and personality, far from physical pleasure and lust. Interpretation of seeing intercourse and seeing genitals A woman’s vagina in a dream and intercourse in a dream Sheikh Waseem Youssef - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Munafiqun in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream or a dream through a website: see roy2a.com. Surat Al-Munafiqun is a political surah with 11 verses found in Part 28 and arranged in Surah No. 63 of the Qur’an. It was revealed after Surat Al-Hajj, and the picture speaks in detail about the hypocrites and their features. And seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream, whether recited, heard, or seen by the Prophet in the Qur’an, has indications of real life, and this we will present through the most important interpretations provided by great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and the Imam. If you see Surah Al-Munafiqun in a dream, it indicates the straight path and the guidance of the dreamer. Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream could be a sign of his innocence from the hypocrisy of those around him and he is not like them. Or it may be a sign of hypocrisy, but in secret, he does not reveal what he hides or conceals in Public places. Seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream may portend the presence of a deceitful and hypocritical friend around the fortuneteller. Reading Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream protects its owner from hypocrisy. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ma’arij in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that he sees Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream, which is One of two interpretations: either directing the enemy or deceiving him. Seeing hearing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream indicates guidance and the path of guidance is explained to the Lord in his life. A complete recitation of Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream indicates the presence of cunning and deceivers around the dreamer. Seeing reciters of Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream indicates that let the viewer not participate in the actions Hypocrisy and its innocence are deception and cunning. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream for a single woman. Seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun means a girl in a dream in the presence of those around her who are deceiving her, and the vision is a warning to her. Seeing a complete recitation of Surat Al-Munafiqun in an unmarried girl’s dream is an indication of following a path Truth, guidance and direction to the truth. Seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun indicates to an unmarried woman that she does not participate in hypocrisy and is innocent of any malicious events around her. If a girl sees a young man reciting Surat Al-Munafiqun to her in a dream, this is an indication that she is close to marrying a righteous young man who will lead her on the path of goodness. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Qadr in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream for a married woman. Seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a married woman’s dream may be a sign of the many hypocrites around her who hide the opposite of what they appear to her. Seeing a married woman reading Surat Al-Munafiqun in its entirety is to follow the path of truth and guidance and for him to help her. May God grant you a good choice. Seeing a husband reciting Surah Al-Munafiqun in the house is an indication that this house is banished from hypocrisy and temptation. Seeing a husband Surah Al-Munafiqun in a dream is an indication that his wife will be harmed. Surah Al-Munafiqun in a dream about a married woman is an indication of her involvement with the hypocrites and she is innocent of their actions. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Ibrahim in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surat Al-Munafiqun in a dream for the pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream by great dream interpreters

preview.html: Seeing a doctor in a dream is one of the visions that interpret matter and its opposite, and the reason for this is that it is interpreted on the condition of God. Seeing a doctor for a sick person is a cure, but seeing a doctor in a dream for a healthy person is an illness! The doctor also comes in a dream as a symbol of many different things. In someone's dream, the doctor may represent the mother, and in another person's dream, it represents reformers, preachers, spies, or other things. Seeing a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin has many interpretations. The doctor in Ibn Sirin symbolizes everyone who corrects diseases. The heart or the body. A dream about a doctor according to Ibn Sirin can refer to a father, a teacher, a ruler, a preacher, a scholar, or it can refer to the doctor himself. Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin tells us about the meaning of a doctor in a dream: “The doctor is a scholar, And a jurist in religion, and refers to every reformer and manager of religious and worldly affairs, as a jurist, lord, and orator.” The symbol of the doctor in a dream about Nabulsi Imam Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi has interpretations that agree in some with the interpretations of Ibn Sirin and differ in others. The symbol of the doctor in Nabulsi’s dream may refer to the mother, As Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation, “The doctor is the mother of the man.” Imam Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi also links seeing a doctor in a dream with a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better. Whoever sees that he has become a doctor in a dream has a prominent position among his peers, even if he does not become a doctor in reality. Seeing a doctor in a dream for a single womanDream interpreters are optimistic about the old saying that the doctor in the dream sees an unmarried woman and sees it as one of the visions that precede happy and humane events in the world. Her life. What is most likely among the visions is that the doctor is a symbol of everyone who manages religion and the world, as Ibn Sirin said. It also symbolizes the jurists and scholars who have the right to decide and contract, and who have a word that is heard among the people. Therefore, many dream interpreters go to the fact that seeing a doctor in The dream of an unmarried woman is a symbol of seeing the person who performed the wedding, or the authorized person or the person who takes his place in the marriage of women. Therefore, the vision is good news for the unmarried girl that her marriage is imminent and her visit to the judge, governor, or person in charge of concluding marriages. Seeing a doctor in a dream for a pregnant woman is known. According to people of interpretation, a doctor entering a person may be a good vision or it may be an undesirable vision. Dream interpreters distinguish between a doctor entering a sick person and a healthy person. What is most likely among them is that seeing a doctor in a patient’s dream is news of his physical well-being and recovery from his illness. Since pregnancy is similar to illness. In many of its symptoms, and sometimes more than an ordinary disease, the interpretation of the dream promises the pregnant woman that she will reach the stage of childbirth safely and will relieve her pain. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: “And if the doctor visits the patient, he recovers from his illness.” Interpretation of the dream of wearing a medical jacket in a dreamThe interpretation of the dream Wearing a doctor’s coat in a dream or seeing the same person in a doctor’s body is one of the good and promising visions. The belief of the people who interpret it is that the dream indicates that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding gold in a dream for a married and single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of finding gold in a dream for a married and single woman, as gold is one of the most natural resources found in nature around us and the most expensive. Dreaming of gold is one of the mysterious things, today we will learn through the lines of our article the interpretation of a dream of finding gold. Interpretation of a dream of finding gold Gold is one of the things that makes the dreamer feel happy and pleased, and this is seeing it in a dream, because of its bright luster, in addition to its high economic value, so many women use it for decoration. Some use it to store and gain its own economic value, and the interpretation of finding gold is as follows: If the dreamer sees that he found gold in a dream and he was sick, this indicates that he will soon recover from the illness. As for the pregnant woman who saw gold in her dream, she will give birth to a male. Seeing finding gold in a dream generally means an abundance of sustenance and many good things that the dreamer will enjoy. Also viewed: Interpretation of a dream of being lost on the road in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of finding a gold earring for a married woman The interpretation of the dream varies according to the many details contained in the dream, where the gold was found, the type of gold, and the interpretation of finding a gold earring in particular is as follows: Finding a gold earring in a dream indicates the strength that the dreamer enjoys and enjoys and what distinguishes him in the society in which he lives. Finding a gold earring in a dream indicates the dreamer's ability to achieve all the dreams and aspirations he seeks. An indication of what the dreamer will enjoy from the abundance of money and many good things that he carries from one country to another. Finding a gold earring in a dream indicates a special and distinctive position that the dreamer will enjoy in the near future. title: I dreamed that I was talking to a cat

preview.html: I dreamed that I was talking to a cat through a website seeing roy2a.com, cats and other animals are creatures that God Almighty created without speaking, even if our master Solomon, peace be upon him, specialized in understanding them by knowing their languages, and that was a miracle for him alone, so seeing the hadith With cats in a dream is a vision that raises doubts and suspicions in the dreamer, so we discuss it in detail and mention the most important interpretations given by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen and others, so follow us. I dreamed that I was talking to a cat. The vision of talking to a cat in a dream indicates a weak character on the part of the dreamer. Seeing talking to a cat in a dream indicates that the viewer is a hesitant personality and is not good at making his own decisions. Chasing a cat in a dream indicates problems that he cannot eliminate in his life. Seeing a cat in a dream. The presence of a deceiver near the dreamer carries evil for him that he does not care about. Close a cat and express his love in a dream. The dreamer indicates that there is a person near the dreamer who is deceived and represents love. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cat scratching in a dream. I dreamed that I was talking to a cat. Ibn Sirin. A cat in a dream can refer to someone who helps the fortuneteller, such as a servant or personal assistant. Talking to a cat in a man’s dream refers to a woman with character. The weak and weak in his life. See also: Names of types of cats. I dreamed that I was talking to a cat. Seeing yourself talking to a cat in a dream for a bachelor indicates that he is surrounded by many deceivers and deceivers and he must beware of them. Talking to a cat in one dream indicates someone very close to it and deceiving it. Seeing yourself talking indicates To a cat in one dream. He did not hide her and gave her security. It is a sign of the presence of a person close to her, who harbors malice and malice and seeks to harm her. Talking to the cat and laughing in one dream indicates that there is a friend who is very close to her, but she makes many mistakes. I dreamed that I was talking With a married cat: Seeing yourself talking with a cat in a dream of a married woman indicates that there are people close to her who are hurting her and deceiving her. Seeing yourself talking to a cat in a dream indicates that a married woman will face problems in the near future but will overcome them, God willing. I dreamed that I was talking with a divorced cat. Dreaming of a divorced woman talking to a cat takes opinions And inappropriate advice from people about her private matters and she must be careful. See also: Interpretation of seeing hunger in a dream. I dreamed that I was talking to a cat for a man. Seeing her raising cats and talking to a man in a man’s dream is a sign that he will face many problems in the near future. Dreaming of talking to a cat in a dream The man was surprised by this, and it turned out that there was a woman near him who carried hatred and deceit toward him and was harming his personal life, and he must beware of her. The presence of a cat disturbs the man during his sleep by talking to him, indicating the presence of people in the workplace or personal life who are harming him. See also: Interpretation of seeing colorful cats in a dream. We are pleased that We show you the reception location of your dreams. I dreamed that I was talking to a cat. Through the comments, the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: Learn about the interpretation of stealing gold in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi and the interpretation of a dream about stealing gold and money.

preview.html: Stealing gold in a dream, most of the time, this is one of the bad dreams, which symbolizes that the dreamer is actually being robbed and it can also be an indication that the dreamer is losing the respect of others for him. Stealing gold in a dream Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold from a place or from someone you know, This indicates that the dreamer is losing the respect of those around him, and it also shows the unknown future and everything bad that is expected for him. As for seeing someone stealing gold in a dream, this indicates your fear of something or it also shows that you are retreating due to moral corruption and the filth of the world. Stealing gold in A dream by Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees in a dream that someone stole his gold and he was unable to remove it and prevent him from stealing, then he will fall into many misfortunes and troubles. But if a person sees in a dream a thief trying to steal his gold, but he was able to control him and prevent him from it, then he will be exposed to some The machinations of those around him, but he exposes them and they cannot harm him. When you dream that someone you know is stealing gold from you, this indicates bad events in your field of work. I know more than 2000 interpretations by Ibn Sirin. Dream Interpretation website on the Internet from Google. Stealing gold in a dream Al-OsaimiInterpreted by the great scholar Al-Osaimi A pregnant woman’s dream of stealing gold in a dream is evidence of the abundant wealth and ample living that she will soon acquire. As for a man who sees in a dream that he is stealing his wife’s gold, she will be exposed to a serious illness or fall into misfortune. Stealing gold in a single woman’s dream. If she sees an unmarried girl in In a dream, losing gold from her, this indicates that it will end well. When an unmarried girl sees her gold jewelry stolen, this means that she hears good news, but if the girl sees that she is stealing gold from her close neighbors, this means that she has achieved her goals and ambitions. If the girl sees If she steals her friend's gold chain, it is good soon and happy news will come to her. It could be a wedding. If the girl was previously engaged and saw in a dream that someone was trying to steal her gold, but she was able to prevent him, then she will soon return to her ex-fiancé. Stealing gold in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold for a married woman. If she is the one stealing it, this indicates that she She feels tired and exhausted and wants to have time to rest and she will get it soon. If a married woman sees in a dream someone stealing gold, this indicates that there are some problems between her and her husband. But if a married woman sees that her gold is stolen and she feels very sad, this indicates that she She will become pregnant soon and the baby will be a good offspring for her and a reason to end all her sorrows. When he sees a married woman stealing gold and being vandalized by the police, he will soon enjoy peace and tranquility. Stealing gold in a dream for a pregnant womanWhen a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has been robbed of gold, this indicates She is going through a difficult birth. If a pregnant woman dreams that her gold was stolen and she cannot get it, this indicates that she will be exposed to many problems in the coming period.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Abu Saeed in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Abu Saeed in a dream. Each of us can search for what dreams carry, so in the following lines we present the interpretation of a dream about Abu Saeed in a dream and whether it is good or bad according to the interpretations of scholars.. Interpretation of a dream about Abu Saeed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about Abu Saeed in a dream can express Goodness and success, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a happy father in a dream, this may indicate happiness and joy, God willing. If an unmarried young man sees a happy father, this may be good news, and God knows best. When a married woman sees her father happy, she can express his freedom from problems, and God knows best. The highest and most knowledgeable interpretation of a dream about my father carrying me in his arms in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father carrying me in his arms in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing someone carrying me in a dream could indicate love and a desire to be by his side, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees in a dream someone carrying her, this may represent taking responsibility, and God knows all that he does not see. When she sees An unmarried girl sees someone carrying her in a dream, she can express her help, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees in a dream a man carrying him, he expresses his help to the young man, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone who looks like you in a dream may indicate marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a person squeezing a happy person, this indicates sustenance, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees someone who looks sad to you, this may lead to trouble, and God knows best. Everything that is invisible. Interpretation of a dream about my father arguing with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father arguing with me in a dream could be a sign of responsibility from the father, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees the father arguing with her, it may express the woman’s wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. When a girl sees She is single, her father is arguing, this can lead to wrong actions and she must return, and God is Most High and knows best. When you see an unmarried young man who has a father arguing with him in a dream, this may indicate wrong actions that he performs, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my father cheating on me To my mother in a dream can express negative changes, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a father cheating on his mother, this may lead to some things that are not good and change for the worse, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If a married woman sees a father cheating on her mother, this may be a sign On a financial crisis, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When a single young man sees his father cheating on his mother, this may be evidence that he is exposed to problems or bad changes, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father who kidnapped me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father who kidnapped me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing kidnapping in a dream could be evidence of the presence of illegal or prohibited funds, and God is Most High.

title: What is the interpretation of swimming in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of swimming in a dream and its meaning Swimming in a dream is one of the visions that has many connotations and meanings, and the psychological state of the dreamer is deduced during the interpretation of the dream. Because the psychology of the fortuneteller greatly affects what he sees in dreams and visions, and the dream of swimming brings good to whoever sees it, and also indicates bad, and through our article we will explain the most important interpretations and consequences of the vision in which you are swimming. Dream. Interpretation of swimming in a dream: Swimming in a dream indicates the psychological state of the one who sees it, as he does not know how to manage his affairs or face them. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is swimming in clear and clean water and swimming easily and smoothly, then this dream indicates that the dreamer lives in A state of psychological stability, calm and confidence in his life. Swimming in a dream if it is in a pool full of mud, dirt, plankton and insects spread around it and the dreamer feels that he is swimming with the difficulty of his life. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a pool: Seeing a swimming pool in a dream indicates the state of stress and tension in which the dreamer lives. It also indicates illness and a person facing crises and difficulties in his life, if a person sees in his dream that he is swimming in distress. A dirty pool and its water is full of mud and impurities. Swimming in the pool indicates the luxury in which the viewer lives and indicates the close relationship between family members and each other, in the event that the pool is wide and clean and its water is clean. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian dream interpretation website that It includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman: Swimming in a single swimming pool in a dream indicates her love life and her partner. As for the girl’s vision that she is swimming in an unclean and narrow pool and its water is full of impurities and plankton, this vision indicates that her partner Her life is a person who manipulates her feelings, and it ends with an emotional shock between them. Where the girl will be exposed. Dreaming of swimming in the sea: The sea in the dream means food, kindness, and a lot of money, and swimming in the sea indicates struggle, effort, and toil to earn a living, if the dreamer is a man, but in the case of a woman, seeing the sea is a symbol of her life partner, where she lives. Women lead a calm and emotionally stable life. Swimming in a pool in a dream indicates a person’s frozen desire to get rid of the mistakes he makes and the life he lives, and his real desire to start over. But if an unmarried girl sees that she cannot swim and drowns while swimming, this is a sign that she You will face problems, difficulties, and crises in an emotional relationship that has no characteristics. Learning to swim in the sea: If one sees himself in a dream that he is learning to swim in the sea and trying to swim and feels afraid, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a psychological crisis and is trying to overcome it in order to quit smoking. If a person sees in his dream that he is swimming in the sea, but the sea is rough, and he tries to get out of it, and actually succeeds, then this vision is good news for the dreamer that he will face problems and difficulties in... The next period of his life,
